00082 namespace srm
00083 {
00090 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL SRF_EquatorialInertial: public BaseSRF_3D
00091 {
00092 public:
00096     static SRF_EquatorialInertial* create( SRM_ORM_Code orm, 
00097                                            SRM_RT_Code  rt );
00098 
00102     static SRF_EquatorialInertial* create( SRM_SRF_Parameters_Info srf_params )
00103     {
00104         return create( srf_params.value.srf_template.orm_code, srf_params.rt_code );
00105     }
00106 
00109     Coord3D* createCoordinate3D(SRM_Long_Float coord_comp1,
00110                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp2,
00111                                 SRM_Long_Float coord_comp3 );
00112  
00115     virtual bool isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const;
00116 
00119     virtual SRF_ClassType getClassType() const
00120     {
00121         return BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_EI;
00122     }
00123 
00127     bool isEqual( const SRF_EquatorialInertial &srf ) const;
00128 
00132     bool operator==( const SRF_EquatorialInertial &rhs ) const;
00133 
00137     SRF_EquatorialInertial* makeCopy() const;
00138 
00142     const char* toString();
00143 
00144 protected:
00145     SRF_EquatorialInertial( void *impl ) : BaseSRF_3D(impl) {} 
00146     SRF_EquatorialInertial &operator =( const SRF_EquatorialInertial & ) { return *this; } 
00147     virtual ~SRF_EquatorialInertial() {} 
00148 };
00149 
00150 
00151 inline bool SRF_EquatorialInertial::isA( SRF_ClassType type ) const
00152 {
00153     if (type == BaseSRF::SRF_TYP_EI)
00154         return true;
00155     else
00156         return BaseSRF_3D::isA(type);
00157 };

00159 
00161 typedef SRF_EquatorialInertial SRF_EI;
00162 
00163 
00168 class EXPORT_SRM_CPP_DLL Coord3D_EquatorialInertial: public Coord3D
00169 {
00170 public:
00173     Coord3D_EquatorialInertial( SRF_EquatorialInertial *srf, 
00174                                 SRM_Long_Float right_ascension = 0.0,
00175                                 SRM_Long_Float declination = 0.0,
00176                                 SRM_Long_Float radius = 0.0 )
00177     : Coord3D(srf)
00178     {
00179         setComponentValues(right_ascension, declination, radius);
00180     }
00181 
00184     Coord3D_EquatorialInertial( const Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &coord )
00185     : Coord3D(coord._srf)
00186     {
00187         setComponentValues( coord._values[0], coord._values[1], coord._values[2] );
00188     }
00189 
00195     void copyTo( Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &coord ) const
00196     {
00197         if (coord._srf != _srf)
00198           throw Exception( SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_SOURCE_COORDINATE, "copyTo: Coordinate associated with a difference SRF" );
00199 
00200         coord._values[0] = _values[0]; 
00201         coord._values[1] = _values[1]; 
00202         coord._values[2] = _values[2];
00203     }
00204 
00208     bool isEqual( const Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &coord ) const
00209     {
00210         return (_srf == coord._srf &&
00211                 _values[0] == coord._values[0] &&
00212                 _values[1] == coord._values[1] &&
00213                 _values[2] == coord._values[2] );
00214     }
00215 
00218     void setComponentValues( SRM_Long_Float right_ascension, SRM_Long_Float declination, SRM_Long_Float radius )
00219     {
00220         _values[0] = right_ascension;
00221         _values[1] = declination;
00222         _values[2] = radius;
00223     }
00224 
00227     SRM_Long_Float get_right_ascension() const
00228     {
00229         return _values[0];
00230     }
00231 
00234     SRM_Long_Float get_declination() const
00235     {
00236         return _values[1];
00237     }
00238 
00241     SRM_Long_Float get_radius() const
00242     {
00243         return _values[2];
00244     }
00245 
00248     void set_right_ascension( SRM_Long_Float value )
00249     {
00250         _values[0] = value;
00251     }
00252 
00255     void set_declination( SRM_Long_Float value )
00256     {
00257         _values[1] = value;
00258     }
00259 
00262     void set_radius( SRM_Long_Float value )
00263     {
00264         _values[2] = value;
00265     }
00266 
00269     virtual bool isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const;
00270 
00273     virtual Coord_ClassType getClassType() const
00274     {
00275         return Coord::COORD_TYP_EI;
00276     }
00277 
00280     bool operator==( const Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &rhs ) const;
00281 
00287     bool isCompatibleWith( const Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &rhs ) const
00288     {
00289         return ((*(SRF_EquatorialInertial*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_EquatorialInertial*)(rhs._srf)));
00290     }
00291 
00296     Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &operator= ( const Coord3D_EquatorialInertial &rhs )
00297     {
00298         if((*(SRF_EquatorialInertial*)(this->_srf)) == (*(SRF_EquatorialInertial*)(rhs._srf)))
00299         {
00300             _values[0] = rhs._values[0];
00301             _values[1] = rhs._values[1];
00302             _values[2] = rhs._values[2];
00303         }
00304         else
00305             throw Exception(SRM_STATCOD_INVALID_TARGET_COORDINATE,
00306                             "Coord3D_EquatorialInertial op=: incompatible rhs coordinate");
00307 
00308         return *this;
00309     }
00310 };
00311 
00312 
00313 inline bool Coord3D_EquatorialInertial::isA( Coord_ClassType type ) const
00314 {
00315     if (type == Coord::COORD_TYP_EI)
00316         return true;
00317     else
00318         return Coord3D::isA(type);
00319 };

00323 typedef Coord3D_EquatorialInertial Coord3D_EI;
